name: Zest And The City
description:
Zest and The City is a combination of both a dating sim and a cooking simulator created in Gamemaker using our own assets (Music, drawings, etc.) that we made from scratch. The objective of the game is to complete the pizza minigame and answer dialogue prompts in order to win.

In Zest and the City, the player plays as a student attending the best cooking school in the country. However, school isn’t without its distractions and obstacles. In order to be the best chef in the world one also has to learn to be a true romantic.

The game will pit the player up against a unique chef student in a one-on-one cook-off that will reveal each student’s personality.
